title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: Mohammed is the first child of King Salman bin Abdulaziz and his third wife, Fahda bint Falah Al Hithlain. After obtaining a law degree from King Saud University, he became an advisor to his father in 2009. He was appointed deputy crown prince and defense minister after his father became king ...

title: Sara bint Mashour Al Saud - Wikipedia
snippet: Princess Sara married Prince Mohammed on 6 April 2008. They have five children, three boys and two girls: Prince Salman, Prince Mashour, Princess Fahda, Princess Noura and Prince Abdulaziz (born April 2021). According to Ali al-Ahmed of Institute for Gulf Affairs, based on the anonymous sources ...

title: Who is Sara bint Mashour Al Saud? Everything you need to know - Tuko.co.ke
snippet: Sara bint Mashour Al Saud is recognised as Mohammed bin Salman's wife. She married her first cousin, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman (the son and heir of King Salman) on 6 April 2008.

title: Sara Bint Mashour Al Saud: Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman’s Wife—Alleged Domestic Abuse Leading to Hospitalization A Southern Fairytale -
snippet: In 2008, Princess Sara bint Mashour bin Abdulaziz Al Saud married Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud in a private ceremony. They’re royal cousins, related to the late Saudi Arabia founder, King Abdulaziz. That said, the circumstances surrounding the marriage are hidden from the media.

title: Who is Princess Sara bint Mashour bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Wife of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud of Saudi Arabia? 3 Facts You Need To Know
snippet: On April 6, 2008 HRH Princess Sara bint Mashour bin Abdulaziz Al Saud married Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud.
